title: Time Stepping Techniques and Preconditioning for Hyperbolic and Anisotropic Elliptic Problems
summary: Explores efficient and accurate solution methods for hyperbolic and anisotropic elliptic problems using high order finite elements/spectral element codes, focusing on matrix-free linear systems. The report includes a literature and software review, comparisons of preconditioning strategies, stationary and time-dependent hyperbolic problem investigations, and conclusions.
